mapper.select: select count(*) from customer where cust_status=0
select * from customer where cust_status=0 limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into customer (cust_id, cust_name, reg_num, cust_type, cust_class, owner_name, main_phone, cust_address, cust_business, cust_event, cust_fax, cust_homepage, emp_id, emp_email, cust_etc, cust_status) values(#{cust_id}, #{cust_name}, #{reg_num}, #{cust_type}, #{cust_class}, #{owner_name}, #{main_phone}, #{cust_address}, #{cust_business}, #{cust_event}, #{cust_fax}, #{cust_homepage}, #{emp_id}, #{emp_email}, #{cust_etc}, 0)
mapper.update: update customer set cust_status=1 where cust_id=#{cust_id}
